revised_title: Symmetry Properties and Matrix Elements for Polar Structures in Conjugated Molecules
tldr: The article discusses the inclusion of polar structures in the valence-bond theory of conjugated molecules. It presents the symmetry properties of sets of structures, both non-polar and polar, and the matrix elements that come into energy calculations. The author evaluates the energy parameters for work with polar structures using the work of part I and the conclusions of this part.
